title: Weatherford Independent School District Home
description: Weatherford Independent School District is located 20 miles west of Fort Worth. Home of the Kangaroos!
cleaned_text: is right around the corner and features our traditional Homecoming Parade! Weatherford High School invites you to take part in this year's parade that will be held on Thursday, September 14th at 5:30 pm. The theme is "Lights, Camera, Action!" To sign up, click on the headline. If you have any questions, please contact Whitney Hubeek at To sign up, click on the headline. If you have any questions, please contact Whitney Hubeek at
